Source.Author: Arctander, P.
Source.Title: Comparison of a mitochondrial gene and a corresponding nuclear pseudogene.
Source.Journal: Proceedings of the Royal Society of London B

SourceTree.Notes:
319 bp of cyt b.
Strict consensus of mt sequences based on parsimony.
Author suggests that paralogous sequences should be avoided in phylogenetic construction and therefore the trees constructed using the assumed nuclear pseudogene were not included here.
